meanings.definition: A unit of weight equal to one thousandth of a kilogram.
meanings.sent1: She measured the flour in tiyns to get the exact amount for the recipe.
meanings.sent2: The scale showed the weight in grams and tiyns.
meanings.sent3: The tiny tiyns of sugar danced on the spoon as she tried to pour it into the bowl.
meanings.sent4: His love for her was as light as a tiyns, barely noticeable but always present.
meanings.sent5: The tiyns of sand slipped through the hourglass, marking the passage of time.

meanings.definition: A unit of time equal to one sixtieth of a minute.
